name: NinjaWarrior
0:
”Alexa, ask ninja warrior to tell me an investing fact”
”Alexa, ask ninja warrior to give me a fact”
”Alexa, ask ninja warrior to tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ninja warrior
des:
When you try to analyze any security in the financial markets you will see returns and ratios. But they don't make any practical significance to your goals. My financial goal is to have a Portfolio of Investments that total 1 Crore INR. That is a good benchmark to start your investing career.
This Alexa Skill will tell you how much money you must invest in a security every month to get 1 Crore Portfolio in 15 years.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
